Posts.Content: Oct 13, 2011 10:24PM bolimh wrote: Hi Dottysgirl!  I am in the same boat as you & it is a little nerve racking  I have had bilateral nipple secretion but only upon manipulation never spontaneous. It has ranged from whitish sticky to greenish sticky.  I just newly developed on the left a brown possibly reddish secretion from my left breast.  It is a small amount on expressed manually.  My Gyno scheduled me for Mammo/Ductogram & US if needed.  He said I do not have any palpable masses or nodes but I am still a little anxious.  I am 35 no history of breast cancer but then again it seems these days no history is required.  My appt is not till the 25th so now I wait..........ugh!!!  This site is helpful.  I think talking with others that have the same issues is relieving at times.  God Bless~
Posts.Title: Ductogram Next Week......... Dottysgirl bolimh
